summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an undisclosed recipient, notifying them that a Florida attorney contacted the AUSA claiming to represent an individual(s) in connection with the investigation and potential civil litigation. The AUSA provided the recipient's contact information and expects the attorney to reach out.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who works in the Southern District of New York and received a call from a Florida attorney regarding representation in the investigation and potential civil litigation.

events.title: Florida Attorney Contact Regarding Representation
events.description: An attorney in Florida contacted an Assistant United States Attorney, stating he met with and may be representing an individual(s) in connection with the investigation and possible civil litigation.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A Florida attorney contacted the SDNY AUSA on or before November 1, 2019, regarding potential representation of a client in the investigation and civil litigation.
The AUSA did not discuss the matter further and directed the attorney to contact another party, whose information was provided.
The email indicates ongoing legal activity and potential civil litigation related to the investigation as of late 2019.
